name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Buffet - AI Article & Graphics Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate images and articles with AI, automatically insert into your WordPress post editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-Powered Content Creation and Monetization Platform: AIBuffet is a platform that allows you to create and monetize various types of AI-generated content, such as text, image, code, chatbot, speech, or writing aid.

Easy and Intuitive Interface: You can select from different content types, use custom templates or write your own prompts, edit the output, and publish or save it in minutes.

Pre-Designed Templates for Various Content Types: You can save time and effort by using our pre-designed templates for text, image, code, chatbot, speech, or writing aid. You can customize them to fit your needs and export them to different formats.

Flexible Token Packs: You can purchase token packs as a flexible alternative to monthly subscriptions. Tokens are deducted only when you create AI-generated content. All packages come with unlimited validity period.
